page.title: 01LIFESTYLES,LOCAL HISTORY.
page.content:
This {D-Block} covers a largely rural area where house prices reflect the appeal of living in the country yet, being near the {M4 motorway} and { {Heathrow,}travelling is easy.
Settlements- villages, small groups or single dwellings- for the most part border the{ Bath Road (A4).}
This study concentrated on...... Lifestyles Landscape Education Farming Housing Local History Religion Events Clubs Recreation Trade Transport Industry Tourism.
The 16 Junior School children at Knowl Hill Primary School undertook the project.
